name: Giana Sisters Junior
overview: An April Fool's Day joke of a game for the youngsters that want to try TGGS without many baddies. Spoofing popular Junior edition games for introductory level playing. It still manages to have some difficult spots and is a decent into into the game mechanics for someone who never mastered TGGS back in the day. After falling into a dark, deep sleep, little GIANA finds herslef in a mysterious dreamworld where everything is strange and ...FORGET IT! Have fun little dwarves, now play your own special Giana Sisters without any pressure, feel free to cheat if you want. High Score saver is disabled if cheatmode is ON. 33 levels, just like the first one. It is getting darker and darker and every fourth level is a cave by night. Creepy isn't it?! High scores will be saved automatically. If you become a pro, teach your parents to play. Then take a break and go out and see the sun. Go Outside and play with friends, have fun in the real world. Welcome to The Great Giana Sisters Junior!
